name: Game of Fun Jumping
description:
How High Can You Jump Up?

Answer: Let’s find out playing this fun game and jumping up as far as you can avoiding obstacles which make it go down.

Game of Fun Jumping is a cool arcade style casual game. Sounds like an easy task? It's easy to play but hard to master. Master your skills for the top records on the leaderboards.

Take your favorite personage as every steep player does and jump up as fast as you can!
